messages.message: The 'refreshRewardsSystem' function makes the dependencies of useCallback Hook (at line 312) change on every render. To fix this, wrap the definition of 'refreshRewardsSystem' in its own useCallback() Hook.

suggestions.desc: Wrap the definition of 'refreshRewardsSystem' in its own useCallback() Hook.

messages.message: React Hook useCallback has a missing dependency: 'handleServiceWorkerAlarmTrigger'. Either include it or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [appState.alarms, handleServiceWorkerAlarmTrigger]

messages.message: React Hook useEffect has a missing dependency: 'handleServiceWorkerMessage'. Either include it or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [handleServiceWorkerMessage]

messages.message: React Hook useEffect has missing dependencies: 'track' and 'trackSessionActivity'. Either include them or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [auth.isInitialized, auth.user, loadUserAlarms, registerEnhancedServiceWorker, track, trackSessionActivity]

messages.message: React Hook useEffect has a missing dependency: 'handleServiceWorkerMessage'. Either include it or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [handleServiceWorkerMessage]
